name: ESG Agent
description: Helps with providing actionable strategies to improve ESG performance

skills.name: ESG Improvement Advisor
skills.description: Helps with providing actionable strategies to improve ESG performance
examples: Based on the ESG risk report, what are the top three recommendations for improvement?

name: Risk Profiler Agent
description: Analyzes business operations and generates risk profiles based on industry and geography.

skills.name: Risk Analysis Advisor
skills.description: Generates a detailed risk profile from given operational data.
examples: Generate a risk profile for a manufacturing company in Southeast Asia.

name: Carbon Footprint Tracker
description: Estimates and tracks carbon footprint for organizations or supply chains.

skills.name: Carbon Footprint Calculator
skills.description: Calculates estimated CO2 emissions based on provided activity data.
examples: Calculate carbon footprint from energy usage data of the past quarter.

name: Supply Chain Auditor
description: Performs audits of suppliers and supply chain partners for compliance for esg.

skills.name: Supplier Compliance Auditor
skills.description: Checks supplier data against compliance standards.
examples: Audit supplier X for compliance with ISO 14001.

name: Financial Advisor Bot
description: Provides financial planning strategies and investment suggestions.

skills.name: Investment Strategy Advisor
skills.description: Suggests investment portfolios based on risk appetite and goals.
examples: Suggest a low-risk investment strategy for a 5-year horizon.

name: AI Research Summarizer
description: Summarizes AI research papers and extracts key findings.

skills.name: AI Paper Summarizer
skills.description: Summarizes research papers into concise points.
examples: Summarize the paper 'Attention is All You Need' in under 200 words.

name: ESG Compliance Checker
description: Checks if given operations meet ESG compliance standards.

skills.name: ESG Compliance Validator
examples: Check ESG compliance for supplier data provided.

name: Language Translation Agent
description: Translates between multiple languages with context preservation.

skills.name: Contextual Translator
skills.description: Provides accurate translations preserving original tone and meaning.
examples: Translate this ESG compliance report into Japanese.

name: Market Trends Analyzer
description: Analyzes and predicts market trends based on historical data.

skills.name: Market Trend Predictor
skills.description: Uses historical data to forecast upcoming market changes.
examples: Predict the next quarter's trend for renewable energy stocks.

name: Incident Report Generator
description: Generates structured reports for incidents in ESG or compliance.

skills.name: Incident Report Writer
skills.description: Generates detailed incident reports from raw event data.
examples: Generate an incident report for a supply chain disruption due to flooding.
